amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds from going to cities that have passed and enacted sanctuary cities or sanctuary political subdivisions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in contravention of section 642(a) of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996 (8 U.S.C. 1373(a)).

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A081) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 194 (Roll no. 266).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A081) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 194 (Roll no. 266).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A081) offered by Mr. King (IA).
